titles.title: Open My Eyes That I May See (Clara H. Scott)

verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Open my eyes that I may see glimpses of truth Thou has for me; Place in my hands the wonderful key that shall Unclasp and set me free.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Open my ears that I may hear voices of truth Thou sendest clear; And while the wave notes fall on my ear, Everything false will disappear.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Open my mouth and let me bear gladly the warm Truth everywhere. Open my heart and let me prepare love with Thy Children thus to share.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
